availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Beckett. Father of Maria Beckett, John Beckett, Samuel Beckett, John Beckett, William Beckett, John Beckett, Robert Beckett, and James C. Beckett. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 103. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 54. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Richland District, p. 20.
